articles.description: All the latest football news and reaction as Leeds United and Burnley earn promotion back to the Premier League with two games of the Championship remaining.
articles.title: Reaction as Burnley and Leeds win promotion to the Premier League

articles.description: Manchester United are said to be keen on signing Wolves and Brazil striker Matheus Cunha this summer.
articles.title: Manchester United interested in signing Wolves striker Matheus Cunha

articles.description: On Thursday night, 32 NFL teams will make their picks as the first round of the NFL draft begins - who will be taken number one overall and who are the future stars to look out for?
articles.title: NFL Draft 2025: Dates, UK times, how it works, top picks & players to watch

articles.description: Ex-Australia cricketer Michael Slater is given a partly suspended four-year sentence after pleading guilty to domestic violence charges.
articles.title: Michael Slater: Ex-Australia cricketer given partly suspended four-year prison sentence

articles.description: BBC Sport F1 correspondent Andrew Benson answers your latest questions after the Saudi Arabian Grand Prix.
articles.title: F1 Q&A: Max Verstappen driving style, Lando Norris, Williams and race penalties

articles.description: Bologna's stoppage-time winner against Inter Milan on Sunday has teed up the prospect of a play-off to determine Serie A's title winner.
articles.title: Serie A: Could the league title be decided via a play-off?

articles.description: The presenter is stepping down from the football show, but will still host World Cup and FA Cup coverage.
articles.title: Gary Lineker: I felt BBC wanted me to leave Match of the Day

articles.description: A feasibility study is under way to establish whether Donald Trump's Turnberry golf course can again host the Open Championship, new R&A chief executive Mark Darbon has revealed.
articles.title: Feasibility study will shape Turnberry's Open future

articles.description: BBC Sport looks back on more than 900 days of Conor Benn and Chris Eubank Jr's chaotic rivalry, which will finally reach the ring on Saturday.
articles.title: Chris Eubank vs Conor Benn: A rivalry from fathers to sons

articles.description: Kawhi Leonard hits 39 points as the LA Clippers level their first-round NBA play-off series against Denver Nuggets.
articles.title: NBA play-offs: Kawhi Leonard stars as LA Clippers level series against Denver Nuggets
